EmailTemplate.name: RE: Thank You For Your Time (1336066777.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Thank You For Your Time (1336066777.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 110 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Tom, It was so great to meet you as well and you are more than welcome. It means a lot to have the face to face connection, not enough people realize that these days. I will check out Omi Partners and let you know my impressions. I have just reached out to the e MBO Access program manager so she can get you set up with any account. Good luck in your search (keeping my fingers crossed!!!)Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Tom Erickson [mailto:terickson@apnbok.com] Sent: Thursday, May 03, 2012 11:27 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Thank You For Your Time Sara, Thank you so much for taking time with me today. It was great to meet you. Here is a link to OMNI Partners, for your information. As I said my point of contact has been Michelle Gill at Michele.Gill@omnipartners.com <http://www.omnipartners.com/>. I will be interested in your thoughts, if any. I will also be interested in trying out the new MBO tool you mentioned. Again, thanks for the meet and greet. I hope to be in touch soon with an engagement to finalize! Until then, please keep your fingers crossed for m! Best regards, Tom
